activities: Veeda is a full service global Contract Research Organization specializing in the early clinical development of drugs with its offices located in Europe and US. Veeda conducts these Clinical Trials for pharmaceutical companies. These trials are carried out on the patients/subjects who voluntarily participate in these trials. During the conduct of these trials veeda collects the data from the patients as required by the trial procedures.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Client, Customer, Clinical trial data, Employee data. This also includes manually processed data
recoursemech: For the complaints that are not acknowledged appropriately by Veeda and the complaints which cannot be resolved between Veeda and the complainant, Veeda agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities or their authorized representatives to resolve disputes, pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
